about.caption: Kismet Kassimo (KSM) (凯斯迈 / 凱斯邁)

about.title: Introduction
about.caption: Hi, this is Kevin Qian. I am currently a Computer Science junior. Besides, I am also an amateur musician, video content creator (not on Youtube though), and an Indie game developer (not as career, but just for fun). My favorite games are Touhou and The Binding of Isaac. I love Coke (and Pepsi)!
